description:
**Fix Overview**:

To remediate the Microsoft Message Queuing information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-21314), it is essential to apply the following security updates:

1. Download and install the relevant KB articles from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 10: KB5034122, KB5034134, KB5034127.
   - For Windows 11: KB5034123, KB5034121.
   - For Windows Server 2019 and earlier: Apply KB5034127, KB5034129, and others as applicable.

2. After installation, restart the affected systems to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates address potential information disclosure by preventing unauthorized reading of portions of heap memory.
- For manual installation, download the corresponding update packages from the links below:
   - [Download KB5034171](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034171)
   - [Download KB5034134](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
   - [Download KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - [Download KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
   - Additional links for other relevant KBs can be accessed similarly.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that the correct version of Windows is running on the system.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of updates to avoid data loss in case of any issues.
